member.name: T:InternationalAddress.IAddressFormatterProvider
member.summary: A service that selects the right address formatter for a culture.

member.name: M:InternationalAddress.IAddressFormatterProvider.Format(InternationalAddress.Address)
member.summary: Format the address for its country's standard.

member.name: T:InternationalAddress.AddressFormatter
member.summary: A flexible address formatter that can be built with a couple format strings.

member.name: M:InternationalAddress.AddressFormatter.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs a specialized address formatter from a couple of format strings.
member.param: A format string for the address. Parameters are, in order: 0. The name 1. The department 2. The company or institution 3. The first line of the street address 4. The second line of the street address 5. The city line (see cityLineFormat) 6. The country
A format string for the city line of the address. Parameters are, in order: 0. The city 1. The province or state 2. The postal code
If true, the address is changed to uppercase after formatting.

member.name: M:InternationalAddress.AddressFormatter.Format(InternationalAddress.Address)
member.summary: Formats the address with the format strings provided

member.name: F:InternationalAddress.Regions.RegionCodes
member.summary: Maps region names to two-letter ISO region codes.
